statements: DELETE FROM energy_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01' AND room_id = 1;
DELETE FROM energy_reports WHERE energy_usage > 100 AND room_id IN (2, 3);
DELETE FROM rooms WHERE house_section = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM energy_usage_reports WHERE gas_usage > 100 AND room_id <= 5;
DELETE FROM rooms WHERE house_section = 'Living Room' OR has_windows = TRUE;
DELETE FROM RoomOccupancy WHERE room_id = 101 AND date = '2022-07-15';
DELETE FROM EnergyUsage WHERE date = '2022-08-20' AND energy_consumed > 500.00;
DELETE FROM EnergyUsage WHERE room_id = 1 AND date = '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM RoomTemperature WHERE date < '2022-06-01' AND temperature > 25.0;
